title: Won ranked game but didn't gain anything?
body:
Today, I won a game as 7/3 Jayce. Seconds after, this is posted.
Wulalowe — We are making a network switch in hops to clear up some of the problems with game connections. We have disabled ranked during this change in case there are additional disconnects during this switch.
I didn't get ANYTHING at all, so I completely wasted my time playing the match, includes the 20 minute queue I am waiting.
Is there something wrong here?

replies.body:
same, i won the game and there is nothing.........
if that game has been concluded, its my promo to diamond
T_T~~~~Rito!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Yeah I just won the game to get back to plat and it wasn't logged, still gold. Please god tell me that the game will be retroactively logged and I'll get put into plat as deserved.
You know what I lost so can't say I'm complaining but that is a little bit annoying. Would be nice if we got a small extension of the length of season now though :S
How'd ya get that icon lol
